title: Define and document the check-in/review workflow
Update skill: project channels are planning-only, all work is async via beads
description: No direct work should be done in response to channel conversation. Channel interactions produce beads only. All implementation work happens asynchronously through the cron worker.

title: Set up cron job for autonomous work sessions
Update cron example in SKILL.md to 5 min interval
description: Cron integration section still shows everyMs: 14400000 (4 hours). Should be 300000 (5 min).

title: Move SKILL.md to projects/SKILL.md subdirectory
description: Skill lives at projects/SKILL.md within the repo so the symlink target is the projects/ dir, not the repo root.

title: Replace 'Zane' with 'OpenClaw' throughout project files
description: Skill should be generic, not tied to a specific agent name.

title: Update skill: no work during iteration meetings, only bead creation
description: Check-in meetings are for review, discussion, and planning. Work output is bead creation only â€” no implementation during meetings.

title: Fix PROJECT.md: incorrect skill path in guardrails
description: Guardrails reference /Users/micahmartin/openclaw/skills/projects/SKILL.md but skill lives in the project repo itself at SKILL.md (symlinked from ~/.openclaw/skills/projects).

title: Document agent spawning strategy in SKILL.md
description: SKILL.md lacks documentation on: MaxAgents field in PROJECT.md, how the cron checks running agent count before spawning, how sub-agents are labeled (project:<slug>), and the overall parallel execution model. This is a core part of the system and needs to be clearly described.

title: Use descriptive filenames for story deliverables
description: Instead of just <story-id>.md (e.g. projects-skill-w9g.md), use a condensed descriptive name prefixed with the last 3 chars of the bead id. Example: w9g-extract-worker-orchestration.md. Update SKILL.md to reflect this convention.

title: Add README.md with installation instructions
description: Explain how to install the skill: symlink to ~/.openclaw/skills, install beads, etc.

title: REVIEW.md only for blockers/questions, not progress summaries
description: REVIEW.md should only contain blockers and questions for the customer. If everything went smoothly, no REVIEW.md. Progress is captured in bead summaries.

title: Test end-to-end: create story, spawn sub-agent, produce deliverable
Cron should prioritize iteration story order, then bead priority
description: When picking work, follow the order stories are listed in ITERATION.md first, fall back to bd priority for unlisted beads.

title: Add 'planning' status for iterations
description: Iterations need a 'planning' status between creation and activation. Workers should only pick up beads from 'active' iterations, never 'planning' or 'complete'. This prevents work from starting before planning is finished. Update SKILL.md and worker.md references.

title: Add MaxAgents to PROJECT.md, cron respects running agent count
description: PROJECT.md gets a MaxAgents field (default 1). Cron should check how many agents are currently working on a project and only spawn more if under the limit.

title: Standardize terminology: use 'worker' not 'agent' throughout docs
description: Replace all references to 'agent' (when referring to spawned sessions doing project work) with 'worker'. Update SKILL.md, references/worker.md, PROJECT.md format (MaxAgents -> MaxWorkers), and any other docs. 'Worker' = an isolated session spawned to execute project tasks.

title: Add notification rules to SKILL.md
description: Send notifications to project channel when: all iteration stories complete, no ready beads, questions arise, blockers arise.

title: Display project settings as a list in PROJECT.md, not single line
description: PROJECT.md settings (Status, Priority, Budget, etc.) should each be on their own line, not crammed together.

title: Extract worker orchestration into projects/references/worker.md
description: Move all orchestration logic (registry check, agent counting, MaxAgents enforcement, work prioritization, spawning, notifications) from the cron prompt into projects/references/worker.md. Cron prompt should simply say 'read and follow projects/references/worker.md'. Single source of truth for the worker strategy.

title: Add Discord channel creation for project check-ins
